Title: Spiral
Plot: Buffy, Willow, Tara, and Dawn nearly escape from Glory when Glory's hit by a truck. Buffy and the Scoobies leave Sunnydale in Spike's RV to run from Glory, as Buffy realizes they'll never beat Glory.
GuestStars: Wade Williams, Karim Prince, Justin Gorence, Lily Knight, Jack Donner, Bob Morrisey, Paul Bates, Carl J. Johnson, Mary Sheldon
